content: भृश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>compar.</ab> भ्रशीयस्, <ab>superl.</ab> भ्रशिष्ठ) {@--1@} Strong, powerful, mighty, intense excessive, very much. {@--2@} Frequent. --शं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Much, very much, exceedingly, intensely, violently, excessively in a high degree, greatly; तमवेक्ष्य रुरोद सा भृशं <ls>Ku. 4. 26</ls>; रघुर्भृशं वक्षसि सेन ताडितः <ls>R. 3. 61</ls> चुक्रेप तस्मै स भृशं <ls n="R.">3. 56</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 170</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Often, repeatedly. {@--3@} In a better or superior manner.
